DataElement.preferredName: Off Label Therapy Patient No Access Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe the reason a patient was unable to get access to an off label drug.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Off-Label Treatment Patient No Access Description
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The use of an FDA-approved device, drug, or treatment for a purpose other than that for which it was approved._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine._The non-affirmative response to a question._The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The use of an FDA-approved device, drug, or treatment for a purpose other than that for which it was approved.

Concepts.definition: The use of an FDA-approved device, drug, or treatment for a purpose other than that for which it was approved.

Property.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
